STRAIT OF SICILY.
PELAGIE ISLANDS.
1. VESSEL, 100 PERSONS ON BOARD, SANK VICINITY
   LAMPIONE (35-33N 012-19E). VESSELS IN VICINITY
   REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST
   IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
   INMARSAT-C: 424744220, PHONE: 39 065 908 4527,
   39 065 908 4409, FAX: 390 6592 2737,
   3906 5908 4409, E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2067/12.
